content:
Project Wizard

This wizard will guide you through the 4-step process for creating a New Project.

1. Start by selecting the Estimate Type for your new project.

2. For your first Project click the 'Create a Blank Project' button.

3. Select the Customer you just created then click the 'Use the selected Customer' button.

4. Add the rest of your Project details, ensuring all required fields are filled in.

Select your Project

With your Customers in place the next step is understanding more about your Project

Click the flashing Projects link above.

Select your Project

With your Customers in place the next step is understanding more about your Project

Click the flashing Projects link above.

Select your Project

With your Customers in place the next step is understanding more about your Project

Click the flashing Projects link above.

Select your Project

With your Customers in place the next step is understanding more about your Project

Click the flashing Projects link above.

Managing your Suppliers

Now that you've added your first Resource, it's important you understand how Suppliers work.

Click the flashing Suppliers link above to begin.

Your Suppliers

Now you've succesfully updated Your Company click the Supplier link above to add a New Supplier.

Managing Resources

Now that you've setup some Suppliers lets link your Resources to your Suppliers.

Click the Resources link above to begin.

Successfully linked a Supplier to a Resource

You can now go back to the Dashboard by clicking the flashing Dashboard link above.
